column2: U.S. stocks tumble Tuesday afternoon, with the Dow Jones Industrial Average on pace to post the sharpest decline, as Russia steps up its attacks on Ukraine.
column4: Dow skids about 750 points, U.S. stocks drop sharply as Russia says it will begin attacks on Kyiv

column2: Shares of PayPal, Intel, and the former ViacomCBS are trading at levels not seen in years. Executives and directors at the companies bought up stock last week.
column4: PayPal, Intel, and Paramount Stock Hit Multiyear Lows. Insiders Scooped Up Shares.
